function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High risk of COVID-19 transmission in offices with vocalizing individuals and light exercise.","Impact":"Potential for significant secondary infection numbers, leading to increased spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Encourage use of masks and proper ventilation systems, and limit vocalizing activities during occupancy.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV-C air sanitizers, ventilation systems with increased air exchange rates.","People":"Occupants and visitors in office environments.","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety personnel, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Risk of COVID-19 transmission in public indoor spaces with varying ventilation and occupancy scenarios.","Impact":"Potential for secondary infection numbers to increase based on exposure scenarios, leading to amplified spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate ventilation measures, maintaining social distancing rules, and monitoring occupancy levels.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, carbon dioxide sensors for ventilation optimization, occupancy tracking systems.","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors in public indoor spaces.","Owner":"Business owners, public health authorities, facility managers."}]}
